zinit_rel

PURPOSE

Pull out results on partitionnoself to initialize searches for relational

This is a script file.

DESCRIPTION

 structures

0001 % Pull out results on partitionnoself to initialize searches for relational
0002 % structures
0003 
0004 masterfile    = 'resultsdemo.mat';
0005 thisdata = [17:20];
0006 ps = setps;
0007 defaultps(ps);
0008 
0009 relinitdir = ps.relinitdir;
0010 currdir = pwd;
0011 
0012 load(masterfile);
0013 for i = thisdata
0014   cd(irmdatadir);
0015   modellike(modellike==0) = -inf;
0016   [m,mind]=max(modellike(9,i,:));
0017   if isinf(m)
0018     error('no results for partitionnoself');
0019   end
0020   g = structure{9,i,mind};
0021   bestz = g.z;
0022   fid = fopen([ps.data{i}, '_bestz'], 'w');
0023   fprintf(fid, '%d ', bestz);
0024   fclose(fid);
0025   cd(currdir)
0026 end
